headline: Assessing Lam Research (LRCX) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) has attracted fresh attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing gains over the past week, month, and past 3 months that stand out among semiconductor equipment peers. See our latest analysis for Lam Research. At the latest share price of $244.92, Lam Research has logged a 12.38% 1 month share price return and a 32.35% year to date share price return, alongside a very large 1 year total shareholder return. Taken together, these figures point to strong...

headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Expands Footprint Amid Industry Momentum
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of Goldman Sachs’s top growth stock picks. On February 17, Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) opened a new office in Boise, Idaho. The new facility spans 9,200 sq. ft. and will initially accommodate about 150 employees from the greater Boise area. Neil Fernandes, Lam Research’s senior vice president of Global […]

headline: If You Invested $1000 in Lam Research a Decade Ago, This is How Much It'd Be Worth Now
summary: Why investing for the long run, especially if you buy certain popular stocks, could reap huge rewards.

headline: 1 Semiconductor Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 We Ignore
summary: Semiconductors are the picks and shovels of modern technology. The amount of data we ingest is also increasing exponentially, leading to elevated demand for chips with more processing power. This secular trend bodes well for the industry, which has posted a six-month gain of 58.1% and beat the S&P 500 by 51.6 percentage points.
